text: Otto Ramón Sonnenholzner Sper (born 19 March 1983) is an Ecuadorian radio broadcaster, politician, and economist. He was the 50th Vice President of Ecuador from 11 December 2018 to 10 July 2020. Sonnenholzner replaced María Vicuña. He was born in Guayaquil. He is running for President of Ecuador in the 2023 election. ==References== Category:1983 births Category:Living people Category:Vice presidents of Ecuador Category:Politicians from Guayaquil Category:Ecuadorian economists
title: Otto Sonnenholzner
